price: dan Kami berfirman sesudah itu kepada Bani Isrā`īl, "Diamlah di negeri ini, maka apabila datang masa berbangkit, niscaya Kami datangkan kamu dalam keadaan bercampur baur (dengan musuhmu)".
arabic: وَقُلۡنَا مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ لِبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱسۡكُنُواْ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqul'nā min baʿdihi libanī is'rāīla us'kunū al-arḍa fa-idhā jāa waʿdu al-ākhirati ji'nā bikum lafīfan
